name: Birds Hunt
description:
In game, you played a bird hunter, with a slingshot and bullets in hand, you have to shoot down the birds fly across the screen.
Birds with cute appearance, but not easy to shoot down, you have to be a marksman could beat many birds.
Each type of bird you shoot down will equal the number of each child, so try to get as many points as possible. The higher the score proved you're a marksman hunter.
However, do not waste your bullets, if you miss, you'll be penalized, noted that because most likely you will own score is negative, this means that you are a hand poor hunter.
With functions share the score on social networks like Facebook, Twiter, G + ... you can easily show off your trophies with your friends. Take a look out of your friends, who are the best hunters.
What are you waiting for, become a hunter Marksmanship now does.
If you see a good game and want to support our team as the game, you can buy an advertising function, or simply invite your friends to join the game and play against scores. That is a huge motivation for us to continue to better products, better quality.

Note: This is a game that can be addictive, you might spend a lot of time and could not take his eyes off the phone screen when playing this game, if you do not want to waste your time, please ignore and do not try to download the game down and play.
However, the game has very good stress effects after the school day and work hard, be entertaining to be able to work more efficiently.

For any comments, you please contact us by email: support@gapptech.net
We are ready to answer all your questions.

Tags: bird hunters, bird hunt, hunting game
